forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 83F. NW winds at less than 5 mph, increasing to 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 28C. NW winds at less than 10 kph, increasing to 15 to 30 kph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low near 60F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 15C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 kph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 80F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 25C. Winds W at 15 to 30 kph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 kph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 73F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 23C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 kph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 54F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 kph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High near 70F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies with gusty winds developing during the afternoon. High 20C. Winds W at 25 to 40 kph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 53F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Windy early. Low 11C. Winds W at 15 to 30 kph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 67F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early. Mostly sunny along with windy conditions during the afternoon. High 19C. Winds W at 25 to 40 kph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 53F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Gusty winds diminishing after midnight. Low 11C. Winds W at 25 to 40 kph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 66F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies with gusty winds developing during the afternoon. High 18C. Winds W at 25 to 40 kph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 52F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Windy early. Low 11C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 kph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 71F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. Becoming windy late. High 21C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 kph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 54F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Windy early. Low 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 kph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High near 75F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 23C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 kph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low around 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 kph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 76F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 24C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 kph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 kph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High around 75F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 23C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 kph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 57F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 13C. Winds W at 15 to 30 kph.
